content.description: The planetarium is completely unique compared to the rest of the ranch.  This long, steep jug haul is really fun and worth the hike over.  Easiest to to clean by having a second climber follow.
content.protection: 7-8 bolts plus two bolt anchor with chains
content.location: See picture, bolt line that is right of the cave and trends rightward.

content.description: A little ways past the Solarium on the other side of the drainage is a wall that juts out into a bend in the river.  The area is a very unique formation for the Pecos River region with extremely rare bullet hard roof features and two classic lines Planet Bob 5.12- and The Milky Way 5.11.
